CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "__EFMigrationsHistory" (
    "MigrationId" character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    "ProductVersion" character varying(32) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK___EFMigrationsHistory" PRIMARY KEY ("MigrationId")
);

START TRANSACTION;

CREATE TABLE "Libros" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "ISBN" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Titulo" character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    "Autor" character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Libros" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "AK_Libros_ISBN" UNIQUE ("ISBN")
);

CREATE TABLE "Usuarios" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Puntos" integer NOT NULL,
    "Nombre" character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    "Contrase√±a" character varying(1000) NOT NULL,
    "Mail" character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    "TipoNotificacion" integer NOT NULL,
    "Tipo" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Usuarios" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "AK_Usuarios_Nombre" UNIQUE ("Nombre")
);

CREATE TABLE "Ejemplares" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "LibroID" bigint NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Ejemplares" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Ejemplares_Libros_LibroID" FOREIGN KEY ("LibroID") REFERENCES "Libros" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "Prestamos" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "EjemplarID" bigint NULL,
    "UsuarioID" bigint NULL,
    "FechaPrestamo" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    "FechaDevolucion" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    "FechaDevuelto" timestamp without time zone NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Prestamos" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Prestamos_Ejemplares_EjemplarID" FOREIGN KEY ("EjemplarID") REFERENCES "Ejemplares" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Prestamos_Usuarios_UsuarioID" FOREIGN KEY ("UsuarioID") REFERENCES "Usuarios" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "Notifiaciones" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Descripcion" character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    "Fecha" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    "Hora" interval NOT NULL,
    "Tipo" integer NOT NULL,
    "UsuarioID" bigint NULL,
    "PrestamoID" bigint NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Notifiaciones" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Notifiaciones_Prestamos_PrestamoID" FOREIGN KEY ("PrestamoID") REFERENCES "Prestamos" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Notifiaciones_Usuarios_UsuarioID" FOREIGN KEY ("UsuarioID") REFERENCES "Usuarios" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE INDEX "IX_Ejemplares_LibroID" ON "Ejemplares" ("LibroID");

CREATE INDEX "IX_Notifiaciones_PrestamoID" ON "Notifiaciones" ("PrestamoID");

CREATE INDEX "IX_Notifiaciones_UsuarioID" ON "Notifiaciones" ("UsuarioID");

CREATE INDEX "IX_Prestamos_EjemplarID" ON "Prestamos" ("EjemplarID");

CREATE INDEX "IX_Prestamos_UsuarioID" ON "Prestamos" ("UsuarioID");

INSERT INTO "__EFMigrationsHistory" ("MigrationId", "ProductVersion")
VALUES ('20211218202543_Initial', '5.0.12');

COMMIT;
